main event: An elderly retired farmer observed a bright, shining object moving slowly across the sky, leaving a white trail.
interesting points: The sighting occurred between 8:30 and 9 a.m. on April 23, 1951., The reported trail was estimated to be about two miles in length., The object was described as bright and shining., The object was moving from south to north., The local newspaper confirmed the farmer's credibility, stating he is not a publicity seeker.
sighted object: a bright shining object with a white trail
